After countless posts from some who seem to know nothing about what it means to be gay. I was surfing the net and found this site and thought to myself...wow...what if some of those right wingers could read this stuff? Would it make a dent in their thinking? Would they finally get it? I would guess not.... but being me I am posting some of this stuff anyway. If nothing else. other gays and lesbians will enjoy the videos and it helps to promote a worthy cause.
 
 Lets start with the opening video, nice music and some wonderful family pictures.
 
 http://www.deardrdobson.com/index.html
 
 Then there is a bunch of great letters I would love for people to read......They seem to say much of what I ahve been saying but great stuff none the less. I particularly like the one from Andrew...read that one first!
 
 http://www.deardrdobson.com/familyletters.htm
 
 
 Then to help answer some of those tricky questions that come up like 
 -it all about sex with you gays or my favorite that we have a deathstyle.
 
 http://www.deardrdobson.com/images/afalsefocusonthefamily.pdf
 
 
 Enjoy. I can't wait to hear some feedback on this site! I can only imagine that many of the anti crowd will look at it for thirty seconds and poo poo it as nonsense but I will try non the less.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Dear Dr. Dobsen
